name: Grey Mould (Flower Blight)
symptoms: ['Grey fungal growth on flowers', 'Necrosis of flowers', 'Death of inflorescence']

name: Green Mould (Raceme Blight)
symptoms: ['Olive-green fungal growth on racemes', 'Velvety texture on infected area']

name: Dry Flower (Pestalotiopsis Blight)
symptoms: ['Unopened flowers appear dried', 'Dried flowers remain attached', 'Necrosis of rachis']

name: Macadamia Husk Spot
symptoms: ['Pale yellow flecks on husk', 'Chlorotic flecks with diffuse halo', 'Dark yellow-to-tan spots', 'Premature nut drop']

name: Macadamia Husk Rot
causal_agent: Complex: Colletotrichum spp, Diaporthe spp, Lasiodiplodia spp
symptoms: ['Soft spongy black lesions', 'Greasy decay of fruit', 'Lesions up to 10mm']

name: Phytophthora Root Rot
symptoms: ['Gradual tree decline', 'Pale green/yellow-green leaves', 'Sparse canopy', 'Branch dieback', 'Stunted growth']

name: Macadamia Anthracnose
symptoms: ['Necrotic lesions on leaves', 'Lesions on shoots', 'Fruit lesions']

name: Macadamia Nut Borer (MNB)
symptoms: ['Entry holes in husk', 'Larval frass protruding', 'Premature nut drop', 'Tunneling in husk', 'Kernel eaten']

name: Southern Green Stink Bug
symptoms: ['Discolored pit on kernel', 'Hidden damage (internal)', 'Immature nut drop']
treatments: ['Harvest susceptible blocks first', 'Weed control', 'Monitoring with Ruthenium red dye']

name: Macadamia Felted Coccid
symptoms: ['White felt-like sacs on branches', 'Honeydew excretion', 'Sooty mold']
treatments: ['Biological control (Metaphycus macadamiae)', 'Insect Growth Regulators (IGRs)', 'Horticultural oils', 'Canopy management']

name: Improper Harvesting/Post-harvest
causal_agent: Poor practices (Beating trees, lack of drying)
treatments: ['Harvest mature nuts only', 'Air-dry nuts in shell']
